title: How does this count as a loss in promos...
body:
Was in queue for my promos and during champ select my client froze out of nowhere.. resulting in a loss in my promos.

http://dav3.demonicprojects.com/league%20crash.png

replies.body:
Any **dodge** during your promos will count as a *Loss* for that series. Because there's no way for the server to determine why you've disconnected or crashed, as it simply sees you leave the champion select, it will be counted as a *dodge*.

This type of freeze will happen if your computer has a poor connection to the matchmaking servers. Most of the time, the network configuration steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) can resolve these types of issues, so I definitely recommend giving it a go.

Let me know if this issue occurs again.
